name: AquaDocs
description: Joint open access repository of the UNESCO/IOC International Oceanographic Data and Information Exchange (IODE) and the International Association of Aquatic and Marine Science Libraries and Information Centers (IAMSLIC), with support from the FAO Aquatic Sciences and Fisheries Abstracts. Thematic repository covering the natural marine, coastal, estuarine/brackish and fresh water environments, including science, technology, management, conservation, and related economic, sociological, and legal aspects.
owner_name: UNESCO/IOC International Oceanographic Data and Information Exchange (IODE)
